impel.name: Impel
impel.desc: Blast through your opponent's guard and pull them towards you.

rupture.name: Rupture
rupture.desc: Detonate your chained target, unleashing a powerful blast that shatters their restraints and inflicts significant damage.

restrain.name: Restrain
restrain.desc: Deliver a powerful kick that binds your opponent's soul to yours.
